content.rendered: Todd Rosen Law Group is a veteran personal injury law firm that handles injury and negligence cases in Miami and throughout the State of Florida.  The firm is devoted to prompt and judicious resolutions for its clients, both in and out of the courtroom. It provides the individual attention, legal expertise and cutting-edge resources necessary to achieve those goals.
